result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Kevin Michael Faust

records.addlTxt: Payable to T.O., chk #033264. Sent to VW this date. bph
Restitution to T.L.O $ 3,652.23. Signed by SJN on 07/12/22. arc
Restitution/Cost Worksheet. km               to SJN on 7/12

03:07 PM  CO: SJN, RPR: V. Deiss, Clerk: K. Anderson, ADA: Holly Elkin Rockow, DF ATTY:  Christopher Michael Anderson, DF:  Kevin Michael Faust appeared. ADA Rockow recites agreement, moves to amend Ct 1. Court amends Ct 1 to Misd. Criminal Damage to Property (Stat. 943.01(1)). DE sworn. DE pleads GUILTY to amended Ct 1 - Misd. Criminal Damage to Property and Ct 2- Disorderly Conduct. Court reviews plea questionnaire and informs DE of rights. Court reads charge and maximum penalty. Attorney's stipulate to the facts. Court finds DE knowingly, intelligently and voluntarily waives rights and makes plea. Court accepts plea, finds factual basis and witholds judgment in favor of DJOC for a period of 2 years. Sentencing recommendations. DE has paid restitution in full. Court approves and signs DJOC. Adjourned: 3:33 PM. kma
Plea/sentencing hearing on June 22, 2022 at 03:00 pm.
Filed by Atty Anderson. arc  e:DA

records.addlTxt:
Adjustment Number: 22A 033578,
Payable Number: 239864,
Receipt Number: 22R 005297,
Amount: $20.00

Settlement conference on May 18, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
Pre-trial/scheduling conference on May 26, 2022 at 08:30 am.

It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations, Tito O. or Maria R. L., or their residence.  The term "no contact" is hereby defined as no contact in person, by telephone, by way of electronic device, email, facsimile, social media including but not limited to texting, Facebook, Twitter, contact through the mail, and/or through a third person.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats.

If the defendant fails to comply with the conditions of his/her bond/bail that he/she may be charged with the offense of bail jumping.

01:37 PM  CO: SJN, RPR: V. Deiss, Clerk: K. Anderson, ADA:  Holly Elkin Rockow   DF ATTY:  Christopher Michael Anderson   DF:  Kevin Michael Faust appeared. Court informs def of charges, possible penalties and rights. Def understands.  Waives reading.  Waives prelim time limits. Court sets bond. Court sets SETC and PSC.
